name: turtlesystemx
description: A cross platform version of the Oxford Turtle System
author: Amyas Merivale

scripts.css:all: npm run css:browser && npm run css:linux && npm run css:macos && npm run css:windows
scripts.js:all: npm run js:browser && npm run js:linux && npm run js:macos && npm run js:windows
scripts.build:browser: del "dist/browser" /s /q && npm run css:browser && npm run js:browser && npm run resources:browser
scripts.build:linux: del "dist/linux/resources/app" /s /q && npm run css:linux && npm run js:linux && npm run resources:linux
scripts.build:macos: del "dist/macos/TurtleSystemX.app/Contents/Resources/app" /s /q && npm run css:macos && npm run js:macos && npm run resources:macos
scripts.build:windows: del "dist/windows/resources/app" /s /q && npm run css:windows && npm run js:windows && npm run resources:windows
